reviewText: My daughter was so excited to be able to watch Mike the Knight especially since we don't have cable. This is the first time I tried instant video and I will recommend it to my friends.
There are only 3 short episodes on the DVD. This was disappointing to say the least. Animation a bit rudimentary.
This movie is VERY short. It's not worth buying. It would be better to  buy another movie, that contains a longer running time.
Bought for my 2 year old boy for Christmas - and he loves it! Also purchased a play shield & sword :-)

My girls love Mike the Knight. This short DVD contains only two episodes from the Nick Jr. cartoon and a few bonus features. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. The Mighty Shield - Mike wants a bigger shield, but it isn't as easy to use as he thinks it will be.
2. The Many Knights - Magic creates multiple Mikes that don't seem to want to listen.

Bonus features:
1. Huzzah for Glendragon Music Video
2. Meet Mike and His Friends
3. Mike the Knight Theme Song
